question: Who patronised the historian Minhaj - us - Siraj and the saint Qutbuddin of Ush -
explanation: For welfare of society, Iltutmish constructed waterworks , mosques and various civil amenities at Delhi. He completed the beautiful monument of Qutub Minar and patronised the historian Minhaj - us - Siraj and the saint Qutbuddin of Ush.
